subject: Vam motor problem
description_text:
Its the 3th same email I send you, but im not sure of u receive it. I send it again in case you didnt. Thanks

> ﻿Hi
> Name: Adria Zayas Fandos
> Address: Escorial 8, 4to 2da Escalera B. 08025 Barcelona, Spain.
> Phone Number: 655091951
> On the other hand, i would gladly open the device and take photos, but I dont have the right tool for it.
> 
> 
>> El 17 sept 2025, a las 3:05, service@simsonn.com escribió:
>> 
>> ﻿
>> Hi Adrià Zayas,
>> 
>> Please provide your contact name, address, and phone number so that we can arrange a replacement for you. Alternatively, you may open the unit and send us photos, which will help us check and identify the specific fault. 
>> 
>> 
>> On Tue, 16 Sep at 2:47 PM , Adrià Zayas <adriazayas87@gmail.com> wrote:
>> My order Number is SSN2484
>> I ordered 3 vam motors and it arrived few days ago. One of the motors started doing loud noises and getting hotter than the others. I think its something wrong with it. Can i have a replacement or something? Thanks in advance
